model.title: Model
model.cloudDescription: Select a cloud AI model. Requires an API key for the provider.
model.noApiKeyWarning: No API key configured for {{provider}}. Add one below.
model.required: Please select a model to continue

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Setup the API key and model for your own AI coworker.
apiKey.invalidFormat: Invalid API key format. Key should start with {{prefix}}
apiKey.savedReconnectToSee: API key saved (reconnect to see prefix)

status.selectModelToComplete: Select a model to complete setup

ollama.description: Connect to a local Ollama server to use models running on your machine.
ollama.helpText: Make sure <link>Ollama</link> is installed and running, then click Test to connect.

openrouter.description: Access 200+ AI models through OpenRouter's unified API.

litellm.description: Connect to your LiteLLM proxy server for unified model access.

openai.baseUrlHint: Leave blank for OpenAI. Set to use an OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

lmstudio.description: Connect to LM Studio for local model inference.
lmstudio.helpText: Start LM Studio and enable the local server in Developer settings

warnings.noToolSupport: This model does not support tool/function calling
warnings.noToolSupportDetail: Tasks requiring browser automation or file operations will not work correctly.
warnings.unknownSupport: Tool support could not be verified
warnings.unknownSupportDetail: This model may or may not support tool/function calling. Test it to confirm.

contextLength.title: Context length requirement
contextLength.description: Ensure your model is loaded with a large enough context length (max available recommended) in LM Studio settings.

speech.title: Speech-to-Text
speech.description: Enable voice input using ElevenLabs Speech-to-Text API
speech.apiKeyConfigured: ElevenLabs API key is configured. Enter a new key below to replace it.
speech.apiKeyHint: Your API key is stored securely in your system keychain.
speech.getApiKeyInfo: To use speech input, you need an ElevenLabs API key. Get one at
speech.instruction1Detail: to start recording, click again to stop

developer.title: Developer
developer.debugDescription: Show detailed backend logs in the task view.
developer.debugEnabled: Debug mode is enabled. Backend logs will appear in the task view when running tasks.

about.title: About
about.description: Openwork is a local computer-use AI agent for your Mac that reads your files, creates documents, and automates repetitive knowledge workâ€”all open-source with your AI models of choice.
about.contact: Any questions or feedback? Click here to contact us

warnings.noProviderReadyDescription: You need to connect a provider and select a model before you can run tasks.
